metadata.title: CVE-2014-10022 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Traffic Server before 5.1.2 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service via unspecified vectors, related to internal buffersizing.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
